alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Pike; Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 11:03PM CDT until June 13 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... East central Polk County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1103 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Umpire, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Norman... Daisy... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Black Springs... Salem in Pike County... Lodi... Langley... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Fancyhill... Roaring Branch Natural Area... Hopper... New Hope in Pike County... Caddo Gap... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
